best_node.title: The Weight of Choice
best_node.description: You contemplate Ronan's request, feeling the weight of his expectation. The dim light of the office casts long shadows as you weigh your options, knowing this decision could have significant repercussions.
best_node.dialogue: Ronan watches you closely, his intense gaze fixed on your face. 'This isn't just any task,' he says, his voice low and serious. 'Picking up the goods is crucial. Are you in or out?'

npc_reactions.Ronan: Ronan leans back slightly, his expression revealing a mix of hope and urgency as he awaits your response.

player_options: I need more time to think.
I can't take this on right now.
